Regulation Name(s): Enzyme Linked Immunosorbent Assay, Herpes Simplex Virus, Hsv-1
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Elecsys HSV-1 IgG immunoassay for qualitative detection of HSV-1 IgG in human serum and plasma on cobas e analyzers
Indications for Use Summary: Immunoassay for in vitro qualitative determination of IgG antibodies to HSV-1 in serum and plasma specimens, intended for sexually active individuals and expectant mothers as an aid in presumptive diagnosis of HSV-1 infection, not for blood/plasma donor screening or pediatric/POC use
